attributes.action: intervene at the earliest possible opportunity to prevent this gross disservice to the elderly community of South East London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Felix Post Unit at the Maudsley Hospital serves older adults with mental health conditions.  It is a unique and irreplaceable specialist service which provides mental health care to service users with complex and chronic problems.  It is threathened with closure as a result of the latest series of cuts.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "intervene at the earliest possible opportunity to prevent this gross disservice to the elderly community of South East London."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12527.asp

Prime Minister's Office
